productAttributes.title: Esprit 100% Cotton Striped Men's Shawl
productAttributes.productDescription: The right accessory can add a great deal of charm to your dressing. Equip your wardrobe with classy accessories like this chic shawl from Esprit. Crafted dexterously from 100 per cent cotton, this black striped shawl has a delightful look and feel. The tasteful multi-colour stitch detailing that runs through the shawl and the threaded hem create a wonderful style appeal. Show off your tasteful dressing sense and get noticed for your classiness by sporting this Esprit Shawl with a casual ensemble that includes a trendy tee and jeans. Sport this attire at a mall or when you hit the town on a weekend. From selling clothes out of a VW bus to setting up flagship stores in crucial business capitals, Esprit has come a long way. Esprit shawls give modern man an edge while keeping him warm.   Fabric Care Hand wash this shawl in cold water; do not tumble dry. You can also get this shawl dry cleaned. Use a warm iron and do not bleach.

Get an impressive and groovy air for an outing in a chilly evening by sporting this Esprit Shawl with a swanky tee and a pair of jeans; many passers by will notice and admire your classy dressing sense. From selling clothes out of a VW bus to setting up flagship stores in crucial business capitals, Esprit has come a long way. Esprit shawls give modern man an edge while keeping him warm.   Fabric Care Hand wash this shawl in cold water; do not tumble dry. Do not bleach the shawl.
